member.name: FontStyle
member.summary: The FontStyle enumeration specifies the style of the typeface of a font. Styles can be combined.

member.name: FontStyle.FontStyleRegular
member.summary: Specifies normal weight or thickness of the typeface.

member.name: FontStyle.FontStyleBold
member.summary: Specifies bold typeface. Bold is a heavier weight or thickness.

member.name: FontStyle.FontStyleItalic
member.summary: Specifies italic typeface, which produces a noticeable slant to the vertical stems of the characters.

member.name: FontStyle.FontStyleBoldItalic
member.summary: Specifies the typeface as both bold and italic.

member.name: FontStyle.FontStyleUnderline
member.summary: Specifies underline, which displays a line underneath the baseline of the characters.

member.name: FontStyle.FontStyleStrikeout
member.summary: Specifies strikeout, which displays a horizontal line drawn through the middle of the characters.
